A

adventure_game - package adventure_game
 
adventure_game.items - package adventure_game.items
 
attack(Character) - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Attack first checks if the other character is invincible, if the other character is invincible, prints a message saying so and ends the method If the other character is not invincible, creates a new random damage modifier to create new damage value.

C

Character - Class in adventure_game
Abstract class Character is used to create a character and is extended by Class NPC and Class Player.
Character(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class adventure_game.Character
The Character() constructor is used to create a new Character
Consumable - Interface in adventure_game.items
Interface Consumable allows for the creation of consumable items like Health Potions.
consume(Character) - Method in interface adventure_game.items.Consumable
Manifest any and all effects of this consumable item.
consume(Character) - Method in class adventure_game.items.HealingPotion
Method consume() uses up a health potion to restore health using the priavte method calculateHealing() to determine how much health it restores.
createPlayer() - Method in class adventure_game.Game
Creates the Player character

D

decreaseTurnsInvincible() - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Removes one turn of invincibility
decreaseTurnsStunned() - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Removes one turn of stun
decreaseTurnsVulnerable() - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Removes one turn of vulnerability
defend(Character) - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Randomly decides between giving a turn of invincibility and boosting damage of the main character (75% chance), or becoming vulnerable to the other character's attack.

E

enterCombat(NPC) - Method in class adventure_game.Game
Iterates one turn each (player and opponent), until one of them isn't alive

G

Game - Class in adventure_game
Primary class of the game, and where the main method is ran in.
Game() - Constructor for class adventure_game.Game
Blank Constructor for the game, purely to have the Scanner, Random, and Player.

Get the base damage of this Character

Get the current health of this Character
getMana() - Method in class adventure_game.Character

getMaxHealth() - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Get the max health of this Character
getMaxMana() - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Get the max mana of this Character
getName() - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Get the name of this Character

H

hasItems() - Method in class adventure_game.Character

HealingPotion - Class in adventure_game.items
Class Healing Potion implements Consumabale and is used to consume health potions to restore health.

main(String[]) - Static method in class adventure_game.Game
 
modifyHealth(int) - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Adds the modifier to current health, then checks if health is less than zero or is above maxHealth.

N

NPC - Class in adventure_game
Public class NPC extends Character and allows the creator of the game to create Character's that aren't the playable character.
NPC(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class adventure_game.NPC
Contructor to make a new NPC

O

obtain(Consumable) - Method in class adventure_game.Character
Adds one consumable to the Character's inventory/storage

P

Player - Class in adventure_game
The main class for the creation and the taking of the turn for the player Character
Player(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class adventure_game.Player
Constructor for the player character
